item.title: 【Helpdesk】How to stream files from Dropbox on Plex?
item.description:
Does anybody here know how to stream files from Dropbox via Plex?
I have about 30TB storage space on Dropbox and I want to be able to stream all sorts of files (audio, video etc.) to my Plex.
How do I go about this/method? I know Plex Cloud is long in the past. I've read that you can do by making your Dropbox a mountable drive? but what software, or best software can do that? and is it a long process or quite easy to setup?
item.author: Krafty K
